__TOC__

A festive celebration of the release of Hardy Heron, in Margarita's Restaurant and Manchester's Strange Brew.

Much discussion of the new features and of the newly formed NH Local Community Team.

In attendance were Steve - team founder, Matthew - event organizer, Nikki and Matt, Broderick, and a few friends.
